table.checkExistQuery: select id from cmbasetable where id=:id
table.existSQL: update cmbasetable set ID=:ID ,F_CMBaseTableTypeID=:F_CMBaseTableTypeID ,Caption=':Caption' ,oldID=:oldID ,oldID_Nazarat=:oldID_Nazarat ,OrderNO=:OrderNO where id=:id
table.beforeMigrateExecOnSrc: insert into cmbasetable (ID,F_CMBASETABLETYPEID,CAPTION) values (644,38,'ضمنی');insert into cmbasetable (ID,F_CMBASETABLETYPEID,CAPTION) values (643,38,'صریح');
